name: Ext_R5_RegulatedAuthorization_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RegulatedAuthorization.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RegulatedAuthorization.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RegulatedAuthorization|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The product type, treatment, facility or activity that is being authorized
element.definition: `RegulatedAuthorization.subject` maps to R4B `RegulatedAuthorization.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ManufacturedItemDefinition)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Ingredient)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
